page.title: 09Shops in Bexley Village
page.content: The highest concentration of traders is situated in Bexley High Street, with only two other smaller shopping parades within the block. There are approximately 75 retail businesses, operating from shop premises including banks, estate agents, clothes & food shops. These shops attract mainly local trade as a large shopping centre is at Bexleyheath. The fresh food shops provide local shoppers with their everyday requirements. People from outside the local area are attracted by the many retuarants & pubs and a few specialist shops such photographers, high class antiques and a stamp centre. Most shops open between 9.00am & 5.30pm six days a week, while a few still close for lunch and have a half day closing on Thursday. There are no street traders.
